course_description: Intro to computational neuroscience with an emphasis on biophysical neuronal modeling of single neurons and small networks. Other topics include spike train analysis, dynamical systems analysis, and dimensionality reductions methods. Some Matlab and general programming skills are required.
prerequisites: This course requires BIOL 360 or NBB 301 or IBS 514 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
